entry_of_information.emailSuccess: You can use the above email address.

entry_of_information.nmFormat: Please enter your name with more than two characters.
entry_of_information.ph_txt_dsc: We use your mobile phone number to check if there is any redundant information, but we do not use it for our PR purpose.

complete_sign_up.add_dsc:
You can log in after completing verification by clicking verification button in your email.

If you do not receive the verification email, please check your spam mailbox or click the resend verification email button.

completion_of_membership.add_dsc:
Thank you for your membership to Yulchon LLC’s website!

If you log in now, you can enjoy a variety of helpful service more conveniently.
You can get most recent legal information, apply for participation in seminars and sign up for a subscription to our newsletters.


Yulchon implements the change password every eleven months in order to prevent you from
suffering any damages due to the theft of personal information by safely managing your
personal information. Please note that if you do not make any password changes within the due
date, you will be automatically withdrawn from Yulchon membership.

You can send the verification mail again by using the
authentication mail resend button below.

sending_confirmation_email.add_dsc:
Please complete verification by clicking change button in your email.
If you do not receive the verification email, please check spam mailbox or click the resend verification email button.

my_info.serviceYN: Receipt of service available to Yulchon members only
my_info.info_txt: You can enjoy special service available to Yulchon members only such as simplified application for seminars/receipt of newsletters regarding your areas of interest.
my_info.confirm_my_info: If you cancel your membership, you will not be eligible for services available to Yulchon members only, rejoining membership by using the same email will be prohibited for 30 days.

If you do not receive the verification email, please check spam mailbox or click the resend verification email button.

regular_password_change.txt_dsc:
Yulchon implements the change password every eleven months in order to prevent you from suffering any damages due to the theft of personal information by safely managing your personal information.
Please note that if you do not make any password changes within the due date, you will be automatically withdrawn from Yulchon membership.
